hero_content.title: Join the Movement
hero_content.subtitle: Grow With Us
hero_content.description: Join a team of innovators, creators, and leaders. We're not just building careers‚Äîwe're shaping the future of digital excellence.

perks.title: Unlimited Leave
perks.description: Take time off when you need it. We trust you to manage your time and deliver great work.

perks.title: Remote Friendly
perks.description: Work from anywhere in the world. All we need is great internet and even greater ideas.

perks.title: Creative Freedom
perks.description: Your ideas matter. We give you the space and tools to bring your wildest creative visions to life.

perks.title: Equity Participation
perks.description: Everyone gets a piece of the pie. When we grow, you grow with us.

perks.title: Learning Budget
perks.description: Unlimited budget for courses, conferences, and books. Keep learning, keep growing.

perks.title: Epic Team Events
perks.description: Quarterly retreats, annual offsites, and spontaneous celebrations. Work hard, party harder.
